name: Learn Python: The Complete Python Programming Course
description: Learn A-Z everything about Python, from the basics, to advanced topics like Python GUI, Python Data Analysis, and more!
goals: To learn the python language
To learn the CORE skills to understand any programming language

name: React - The Complete Guide (incl Hooks, React Router, Redux)
description: Dive in and learn React.js from scratch! Learn Reactjs, Hooks, Redux, React Routing, Animations, Next.js and way more!
goals: Build powerful, fast, user-friendly and reactive web apps
Apply for high-paid jobs or work as a freelancer in one the most-demanded sectors you can find in web dev right now
Provide amazing user experiences by leveraging the power of JavaScript with ease
Learn all about React Hooks and React Components

name: Mastering Modern React with Redux State Management
description: Master React and Redux with React Router, Webpack, and Create-React-App. Includes Hooks!
goals: Create dynamic web apps using the latest in web technology
Practice your skills with many large projects, exercises, and quizzes
Become fluent in the toolchain supporting React, including NPM, Webpack, Babel, and ES6/ES2015 Javascript syntax
Master the fundamentals concepts behind React and Redux

name: Vue - The Complete Guide (incl. Router & Composition API)
description: Vue.js is an awesome JavaScript Framework for building Frontend Applications! VueJS mixes the Best of Angular + React!
goals: Build amazing Vue.js Applications - all the Way from Small and Simple Ones up to Large Enterprise-level Ones
Leverage Vue.js in both Multi- and Single-Page-Applications (MPAs and SPAs)
Understand the Theory behind Vue.js and use it in Real Projects
earn the latest version of Vue (Vue 3), including the brand-new Composition API

name: Java Programming Masterclass covering Java 11 & Java 17
description: Learn Java In This Course And Become a Computer Programmer. Obtain valuable Core Java Skills And Java Certification
goals: Learn the core Java skills needed to apply for Java developer positions in just 14 hours.
Be able to demonstrate your understanding of Java to future employers
Be able to sit for and pass the Oracle Java Certificate exam if you choose.
Obtain proficiency in Java 8 and Java 11.

name: Build Web Apps with Vue JS 3 & Firebase
description: Learn Vue JS 3 & Firebase by creating & deploying dynamic web apps (including Authentication)
goals: Learn how to create Vue 3 applications from the ground-up
Get hands-on & in-depth experience using the latest Vue 3 features (such as the Composition API)
Build & deploy 4 real-world web apps with Vue & Firebase
Learn how to implement an authentication system into your Vue js apps using Firebase Auth
